summary: video: fbdev: vesafb: Fix a use-after-free due early fb_info cleanup
details:
video: fbdev: vesafb: Fix a use-after-free due early fb_info cleanup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit f605f5558ecc175ec70016a3c15f007cb6386531, it was introduced in version v5.17.9 by commit a1aac13288de2935dc1a9330a93b1ac92f1e2b72. For more details please see the references link.
